system.description:
You can craft elixirs by making an INT check. Apply the modifier for the chosen @UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.documents.JournalEntry.4G9LZfiREUuQViCf.JournalEntryPage.pner3NgfU4oKKvjT]{Delivery Method} to this check. This does not take your action.

If you fail, you canâ€™t make that elixir again until you rest. Except for mask infusions, elixirs expire in 5 rounds.

Critical success increases DC or die category by one or doubles duration. Critical fails self-inflict harmful elixirs.
